title: BET Awards, Church Complaints, Cardi B., NBA Siblings and more.
itunes:title: BET Awards, Church Complaints, Cardi B., NBA Siblings and more.
description:
Good morning and Happy 13th wedding anniversary to Mr. and Mrs. H!  Regina Hall hosted the BET Awards and ripped the stage.  Mary J. Blige performed and reminded us why she is a living legend!  Church Complaints is here with Rev. Adnoid and Deacon Junior.  Jussie Smollett's case will be reinvestigated.  Cardi B. is facing charges stemming from a club brawl.  We hit Big Dog with Rapid Fire questions.  Comedy Roulette has the things people say when they want to curse but can't.  Ashley Madison tells us the cities that have the most cheating.  Have you ever heard of the Holiday brothers that all play in the NBA?  Do you know the top 5 reasons people want marijuana legalized?  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog speaks about you get what you give and giving and taking properly is ideal and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
